full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI BDAG MDUN BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL BSGRAL LAS GTOR BZLOG DANG BCAS PA'I RNAM BZHAG MKHA' 'GRO'I DGONGS RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @036B (CES DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI BDAG MDUN BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKAL BSGRAL LAS GTOR BZLOG DANG BCAS PA'I RNAM BZHAG MKHA' 'GRO'I DGONGS RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA SOR GZHUNG LUGS DU MA LA SPOBS PA MCHOG TU DGE BA RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG SHES RAB KYIS BSKUL TE HAR CHIN THU MED KYI SA CHAR GSAR RTZOM BGYIS PA ZHIG YOD KYANG DER BSKRAL @037A *, ,LAS KYI RIM PA MA TSANG BAR BRTEN PHYIS SU MDZO DGE STOD NAS DON GNYER BA 'GA' ZHIG GIS CHA TSANG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SNGAM LA BSGYUR 'GOD PHRAN BU DANG, KHA SBYOR DBYE BA'I SKOR YANG KHA BSKANG STE, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS GA-YAR KHRAL DU SBYAR BA DGE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
